conceptName: Overview of Data Subject Rights under GDPR
notes: Introduces the full set of individual rights under GDPR
Most commonly exercised GDPR right with AI relevance
Links data subject rights to data quality and AI accuracy

conceptName: Right to Erasure (Right to be Forgotten)
notes: Challenges AI data retention and model training
Introduces limits on continued AI processing
Introduces data reuse and interoperability expectations
Relevant for AI-driven profiling and decisions

conceptName: Handling Data Subject Requests in AI Systems
notes: Bridges rights to operational governance processes
Explicit GDPR hook for AI-driven decisions

conceptName: Explainability Expectations for Data Subject Requests
notes: Sets expectations without technical explainability depth
